select SEQ_T_MERCHANT.nextval as ID from dual

mapper.update:
update T_MERCHANT
REQ_SEQ_NO = #{REQ_SEQ_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOP_ORG_ID = #{TOP_ORG_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORG_ID = #{ORG_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPARTMENT_ID = #{DEPARTMENT_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MERCHANT_CODE = #{MERCHANT_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_NAME = #{MERCHANT_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_SHORT_NAME = #{MERCHANT_SHORT_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENTS_ID = #{AGENTS_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CUSTOMER_MANAGER = #{CUSTOMER_MANAGER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_MANAGER_NAME = #{CUSTOMER_MANAGER_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_MANAGER_CODE = #{CUSTOMER_MANAGER_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED_STATUS = #{ENABLED_STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED_USER = #{ENABLED_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED_TIME = #{ENABLED_TIME,jdbcType=DATE},
APPROVAL_STATUS = #{APPROVAL_STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVAL_REMARK = #{APPROVAL_REMARK,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVER = #{APPROVER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVER_NAME = #{APPROVER_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVER_CODE = #{APPROVER_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPROVAL_TIME = #{APPROVAL_TIME,jdbcType=DATE},
ACTIVE_STATUS = #{ACTIVE_STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_REMARK = #{ACTIVE_REMARK,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_USER = #{ACTIVE_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_NAME = #{ACTIVE_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_CODE = #{ACTIVE_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVE_TIME = #{ACTIVE_TIME,jdbcType=DATE},
RECORD_STATUS = #{RECORD_STATUS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_ID = #{MODIFY_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFY_NAME = #{MODIFY_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_CODE = #{MODIFY_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{MODIFY_TIME,jdbcType=DATE},
ORIGIN_ID = #{ORIGIN_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INPUT_WAY_ID = #{INPUT_WAY_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_ID = #{CREATED_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_NAME = #{CREATED_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_CODE = #{CREATED_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_TIME = #{CREATED_TIME,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATED_ID = #{UPDATED_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATED_NAME = #{UPDATED_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_CODE = #{UPDATED_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_TIME = #{UPDATED_TIME,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_MERCHANT set REQ_SEQ_NO = #{REQ_SEQ_NO,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOP_ORG_ID = #{TOP_ORG_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORG_ID = #{ORG_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPARTMENT_ID = #{DEPARTMENT_ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID FROM T_MERCHANT A LEFT JOIN T_MERCHANT_BASIC_INFO B ON A.ID = B.MERCHANT_ID LEFT JOIN T_MERCHANT_SHOP C ON A.ID = C.MERCHANT_ID WHERE A.ENABLED_STATUS = '0' AND A.APPROVAL_STATUS = '1' AND A.ACTIVE_STATUS = '1' AND C.APPROVAL_STATUS = '1' AND C.STATUS = '0' AND C.ONLINE_STATUS = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM T_RATE_TEMPLATE_TYPE D WHERE D.ID = B.RATE_ID)
